Linux '''Caixa MÃ¡gica''' (CM) ({{lang-en|Magic Box}}) is a Portuguese [[Linux distribution]] developed and maintained by '''Caixa MÃ¡gica Software'''. <br><br>
This project was created in 2000, by Paulo Trezentos and Daniel Neves at [[ADETTI]], a Portuguese research centre. <br>
This project was created in 2000, by Paulo Trezentos and Daniel Neves at [[ADETTI]], a Portuguese research centre. <br>

In 2004 there was a need to restructure the project because of the growth of the team and new challenges faced, so a spin-off of ADETTI was created, designated by "'''Caixa MÃ¡gica Software'''". <ref> {{Cite press release | title=History of Caixa MÃ¡gica | url=http://www.caixamagica.pt/pag/i-cxmag2.php?id=2 | language=Portuguese |accessdate=2008-03-23}}</ref>
<br><br>
<br><br>
Its one of the most widely used Linux distributions in Portugal, it uses the [[RPM Package Manager]]. <br>
